SinglePropertyChangeReader Class Reference

This class is used to read in and apply a change to a single property. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is used to read in and apply a change to a single property.

It may be a simple property of an entity or a single value in another PropertyOwner like an array.

The documentation for this class was generated from the following files:
